content: tbl yo sk2p yo k1 tbl k1 3 times k1 tbl yo k2tog tbl k17 each row increases stitch count by one row 7 yo k16 k2tog yo k1 tbl k2 k1 k2tog yo row 1 yo k16 k2tog yo k1 tbl k3 k2tog yo 2 k1 tbl k2 3 times k1 k1 tbl yo k2tog tbl k17 times k1 tbl k3 k1 tbl yo k2tog tbl k17 row 9 yo k16 k2tog yo k1 tbl yo k2tog k1 4 row 2 and all other even numbered row through row 12 times k2tog yo k1 tbl yo k2tog tbl k17 yo knit to end row 11 yo k16 k2tog yo k1 tbl k1 k1 tbl yo row 3 yo k16 k2tog yo k1 tbl yo k2tog k1 sk2p 4 times yo k1 tbl k1 k1 tbl yo k2tog tbl k17 k2tog yo k1 tbl 3 times yo k2tog tbl k17 66 sts 3 1 5 times 15 sts 15 sts chart c - work 1 time note that chart shows right side row only chart c written instructions row 1 yo k18 k1 tbl k3 k1 tbl k1 5 times k18 row 2- 4 yo knit to end 70 sts autonomy cowl - 3 rosemary romi hill fingering weight hack a u t o n o m y measurements circumference unstretched 20 inches depth 20 inches without tassel measurements taken after blocking washing laying flat to dry sample was not stretched or pinned materials fingering weight wool approximately 200 yards/50g green about 140 yards bottom sample on cover archive green colorway from lady dye yarns 1 - set each 16 inch length circular knitting needles in us 5/3 75mm and us 3/3 25mm locking stitch marker plain stitch markers tapestry needle tassel maker or cardboard to wrap tassel gauge 20 sts/40 row = 4 /10cm in garter stitch after mild blocking wash lay flat to dry or steam block every knitter s gauge is different please check gauge exact gauge is not important however a looser gauge will result in the use of more yardage pattern hack round 3 knit to one stitch before end p1 round 4 purl this simple pattern hack is written for fingering weight yarn instead of the original dk weight it uses all the same work rounds 3 and 4 an additional 6 times techniques and charts the notes below are used in conjunction with the main pattern switch to smaller needles work as for dk version through chart b to omit charted work round 3 an additional time and bind off on row 4 patterning repeat set-up row 1 and 2 until 92 stitches using stretchy bind off see abbreviations fasten_off have been worked finishing work chart b an additional two times the six stitch finish as for dk version using more strands of yarn to repeat area will be worked an additional 2 times each make tassel sample uses 40 strands which are then time the chart is worked 90 sts doubled over
